= Start up help =

 # Download and install [http://www.grails.org/download/archive/Grails Grails 1.3.2]
 # Checkout project
 # Open terminal and go to directory `web/grails-smartgwt/`
 # Start the app with `grails run-app`
 # Open your browser and go to http://localhost:8080/grails-smartgwt
